articles.title: 5 asteroids to pass Earth in the coming days; NASA reveals speed, size, and other details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed that the orbits of 5 asteroids will bring them close to Earth in the next few days. These asteroids range in size from 53 feet to 130 feet! Know their speed, size, distance of approach, and more, as per the space agency.
